tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_scorecards (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    department_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    entry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_scorecards (
  scorecard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  value NUMERIC,
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)
